title: EPISTOLA Milton Horowitz
html:
EPISTOLA Milton Horowitz

I hope that you or VERBATIM readers can advise me of a word about which I've been queried. What is the word to describe the use of a trade name, like Xerox, as a verb—for example, “Xerox this letter.” Is there such a word?

[Milton Horowitz, Jackson Heights, New York]

[Thanks to Fred Shapiro for pointing out that this is called generification.—Ed.]
